title: Frank Gehry has died
summary:
Frank Gehry, one of the most influential architects of the last century, has died aged 96. Renowned for his avant-garde, deconstructivist style, Gehry utilized unconventional materials like chain-link fencing, plywood, and titanium, breaking from traditional architectural principles.

His international breakthrough came in 1997 with the titanium-covered Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain, which famously created the "Bilbao effect" by revitalizing the city's economy and tourism. Earlier, he gained recognition by redesigning his own Santa Monica home.

Gehry, who received the Pritzker Architecture Prize in 1989, pioneered the use of 3D modeling to create his signature curvy, sculptural buildings. His diverse portfolio includes the Walt Disney Concert Hall in Los Angeles, the Jay Pritzker Pavilion in Chicago, the Louis Vuitton Foundation in Paris, and Prague's Dancing House. Despite facing critical remarks, he often shrugged them off, famously quipping, "At least they're looking!" His guest appearance on The Simpsons, where he voiced himself, later "haunted" him due to misconceptions about his design process.

Tributes from Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney, author Paul Goldberger, and the Guggenheim Museum celebrated his unique vision and eagerness to "push the envelope" and engage people emotionally. He is survived by his wife, Berta Isabel Aguilera, and four children. His spirit and legacy will endure through his iconic structures worldwide.
chinese_title: 弗兰克·盖里逝世
chinese_summary:
弗兰克·盖里（Frank Gehry），上世纪最具影响力的建筑师之一，享年96岁去世。他以其前卫的解构主义风格而闻名，盖里利用了铁丝网、胶合板和钛等非传统材料，打破了传统的建筑原则。

他的国际突破性成就于1997年达成，当时他在西班牙毕尔巴鄂设计的钛板古根海姆博物馆（Guggenheim Museum）闻名遐迩地创造了“毕尔巴鄂效应”，成功振兴了该市的经济和旅游业。早些时候，他通过重新设计自己在圣莫尼卡（Santa Monica）的家而获得认可。

盖里于1989年荣获普利兹克建筑奖（Pritzker Architecture Prize），他率先使用3D建模技术来创建他标志性的曲线、雕塑般建筑。他的多元化作品包括洛杉矶的华特迪士尼音乐厅（Walt Disney Concert Hall）、芝加哥的杰伊·普利兹克露天音乐厅（Jay Pritzker Pavilion）、巴黎的路易威登基金会（Louis Vuitton Foundation）以及布拉格的跳舞的房子（Dancing House）。尽管面临批评，他常常不以为意，并留下了一句名言：“至少他们还在看！”他曾在《辛普森一家》（The Simpsons）中为自己配音客串，后来却因为人们对他的设计过程产生误解而“困扰”了他。

加拿大总理马克·卡尼（Mark Carney）、作家保罗·戈德伯格（Paul Goldberger）和古根海姆博物馆纷纷致敬，赞扬了他独特的愿景以及“突破界限”并从情感上感染人们的热情。他身后留下了妻子贝尔塔·伊莎贝尔·阿吉莱拉（Berta Isabel Aguilera）和四个孩子。他的精神和遗产将通过他遍布世界各地的标志性建筑永存。

title: Framework Sponsors CachyOS
summary:
CachyOS has announced a major new sponsorship from Framework, the company recognized for its modular and repairable laptops. This partnership is highly significant for the open-source Linux project, as finding hardware partners genuinely supportive of Linux is rare.

Framework's contribution includes a Framework Laptop 16, which CachyOS will utilize to optimize its kernel and packages on modern hardware. Additionally, Framework has committed to a $250 monthly donation. This financial support constitutes approximately 10% of CachyOS's total monthly donations, underscoring its importance to the community-driven project.

This sponsorship will help CachyOS stabilize its infrastructure and further its ultimate goal: enabling developers to work full-time on the project to deliver the fastest, most optimized Linux experience possible. CachyOS encourages its community to show support for Framework and to check out their blog post for more information on their sponsorship initiatives.
chinese_title: Framework 赞助 CachyOS
chinese_summary:
CachyOS 宣布获得 Framework 的一项重大新赞助，该公司以其模块化和可维修笔记本电脑而闻名。这项合作对这个开源 Linux 项目意义重大，因为找到真正支持 Linux 的硬件合作伙伴非常罕见。

Framework 的贡献包括一台 Framework Laptop 16，CachyOS 将利用它在现代硬件上优化其内核和软件包。此外，Framework 还承诺每月捐赠 250 美元。这笔财政支持约占 CachyOS 每月总捐款的 10%，凸显了它对这个社区驱动项目的重要性。

这项赞助将帮助 CachyOS 稳定其基础设施，并进一步实现其最终目标：使开发人员能够全职从事该项目，以提供最快、最优化的 Linux 体验。CachyOS 鼓励其社区支持 Framework，并查看他们的博客文章，了解更多关于其赞助计划的信息。

title: Synadia and TigerBeetle Pledge $512k to the Zig Software Foundation
summary:
Synadia and TigerBeetle have jointly pledged $512,000 over two years to the Zig Software Foundation, supporting the language, its leadership, and community. TigerBeetle chose Zig in 2020 for its financial database, opting against C and Rust.

Rust was deemed unsuitable due to its default out-of-memory (OOM) philosophy and borrow checker, which conflicted with TigerBeetle's need for explicit static allocation, a single-threaded architecture, and a "total correctness is a design problem" methodology.

Zig was chosen for Andrew Kelley's exceptional design, a philosophy emphasizing no hidden allocations or control flow, features like `comptime`, and a favourable expressivity-to-complexity ratio. It functions as a "better C" by fixing issues like spatial memory safety with bounds checking and enabling default checked arithmetic. Zig's approach to safety is seen as a spectrum, enhancing reliability while maintaining simplicity. Its subtractive design and ease of learning were also key factors.

Five years on, the decision is strongly validated. TigerBeetle has undergone extreme fuzzing (VOPR, Vörtex, Jepsen audits), with Zig's quality proving flawless. The language has been crucial to the company's success and rapid velocity, attracting major enterprise clients. Even pre-1.0 breaking changes have been manageable and often improved compilation speed. Zig's investment in independent compiler backends is also noted for future precision.

Both companies support Andrew Kelley's strong BDFL leadership, valuing conceptual integrity in design. Their "no strings attached" pledge aims to ensure the ZSF remains independent and transparent, with most funds directly supporting contributors. Synadia CEO Derek Collison, a fellow Zig sponsor, initiated the joint announcement, with each company donating $256,000. They encourage further donations to the Zig Software Foundation.
chinese_title: Synadia 和 TigerBeetle 承诺向 Zig 软件基金会捐赠 51.2 万美元。
chinese_summary:
Synadia 和 TigerBeetle 联合承诺在两年内向 Zig 软件基金会捐赠 51.2 万美元，以支持该语言、其领导层和社区。TigerBeetle 于 2020 年为其金融数据库选择了 Zig，而非 C 和 Rust。

Rust 因其默认的内存不足（OOM）处理哲学和借用检查器而被认为不适用，这与 TigerBeetle 对显式静态分配、单线程架构以及“全面正确性是一个设计问题”的方法论需求相冲突。

选择 Zig 是因为 Andrew Kelley 卓越的设计，其设计哲学强调没有隐藏的内存分配或控制流，拥有 `comptime` 等特性，以及出色的表达力与复杂性比。通过修正诸如使用边界检查解决空间内存安全问题，以及默认启用检查算术，它充当了“更好的 C”。Zig 对安全的处理被视为一个光谱，在增强可靠性的同时保持简洁。其减法设计和易学性也是关键因素。

五年过去了，这一决定得到了强有力的验证。TigerBeetle 经历了极端的模糊测试（VOPR、Vörtex、Jepsen 审计），Zig 的质量被证明无懈可击。该语言对公司的成功和快速发展至关重要，并吸引了重要的企业客户。即使是 1.0 版本之前的破坏性变更也易于管理，并且通常能提高编译速度。Zig 对独立编译器后端进行的投资也因其未来的精确性而受到关注。

两家公司都支持 Andrew Kelley 强有力的 BDFL 领导，重视设计中的概念完整性。他们“无附加条件”的承诺旨在确保 ZSF 保持独立和透明，大部分资金将直接支持贡献者。Synadia 首席执行官、同样是 Zig 赞助商的 Derek Collison 发起了这项联合声明，两家公司各捐赠 25.6 万美元。他们鼓励向 Zig 软件基金会进行更多捐赠。

title: NeurIPS 2025 Best Paper Awards
summary:
NeurIPS 2025 announced seven Best Paper Awards, comprising four "Best Papers" (one from the Datasets & Benchmarks track) and three "Runner-Ups," recognizing groundbreaking advancements across machine learning.

The "Best Papers" include:

1.  **"Artificial Hivemind: The Open-Ended Homogeneity of Language Models (and Beyond)"** introduces Infinity-Chat, a large-scale benchmark revealing a "Artificial Hivemind" effect, where LLMs generate homogenous content. This paper highlights critical miscalibration with diverse human preferences, posing risks to human creativity.
2.  **"Gated Attention for Large Language Models: Non-linearity, Sparsity, and Attention-Sink-Free"** demonstrates that a simple head-specific sigmoid gate after Scaled Dot-Product Attention consistently improves LLM performance, training stability, and long-context extrapolation. This easy-to-implement modification has been adopted in Qwen3-Next models.
3.  **"1000 Layer Networks for Self-Supervised RL: Scaling Depth Can Enable New Goal-Reaching Capabilities"** challenges conventional RL wisdom by showing that increasing network depth up to 1024 layers in self-supervised reinforcement learning significantly boosts performance and enables sophisticated new capabilities.
4.  **"Why Diffusion Models Don’t Memorize: The Role of Implicit Dynamical Regularization in Training"** provides foundational insights into diffusion models, identifying distinct generalization and memorization timescales. It reveals an expanding window for effective generalization due to implicit dynamical regularization, unifying empirical and theoretical findings.

One "Runner-Up" paper, **"Does Reinforcement Learning Really Incentivize Reasoning Capacity in LLMs Beyond the Base Model?"**, critically examines Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR) in LLMs. It argues that current RLVR primarily improves sampling efficiency rather than eliciting fundamentally new reasoning patterns or capabilities beyond the base model, suggesting distillation might be more effective.
chinese_title: NeurIPS 2025 最佳论文奖
chinese_summary:
NeurIPS 2025 宣布了七项最佳论文奖，其中包括四项“最佳论文”（一项来自数据集与基准测试赛道）和三项“荣誉提名”，旨在表彰机器学习领域的突破性进展。

“最佳论文”包括：

1.  **“人工蜂巢：语言模型（及其他）的开放式同质性”** 介绍了一个名为 Infinity-Chat 的大规模基准测试，揭示了“人工蜂巢”效应，即大型语言模型（LLMs）生成同质化内容。该论文强调了与多样化人类偏好之间存在的严重失衡，对人类创造力构成风险。
2.  **“大型语言模型的门控注意力：非线性、稀疏性和无注意力汇聚”** 展示了在缩放点积注意力（Scaled Dot-Product Attention）之后添加一个简单的、针对每个头部的 Sigmoid 门控，可以持续提升大型语言模型的性能、训练稳定性和长上下文外推能力。这一易于实现的修改已被 Qwen3-Next 模型采用。
3.  **“用于自监督强化学习的千层网络：深度扩展可实现新的目标达成能力”** 通过展示在自监督强化学习中将网络深度增加至 1024 层可以显著提升性能并实现复杂的新能力，挑战了传统的强化学习（RL）认知。
4.  **“扩散模型为何不记忆：训练中隐式动态正则化的作用”** 为扩散模型提供了基础性见解，识别了不同的泛化和记忆时间尺度。该研究揭示了由于隐式动态正则化，有效泛化的窗口不断扩大，统一了经验和理论发现。

一项“荣誉提名”论文，**“强化学习真的能在基础模型之外激励大型语言模型的推理能力吗？”**，批判性地审视了大型语言模型中带有可验证奖励的强化学习（RLVR）。该论文认为，当前的 RLVR 主要提升了采样效率，而非在基础模型之外激发根本性的新推理模式或能力，并提出蒸馏法可能更有效。

title: PalmOS on FisherPrice Pixter Toy
summary:
The rePalm project aims to port PalmOS to a Fisher-Price Pixter Color toy, a 2000s children's device featuring a 160x160 color display and a Sharp LH75411 ARM SoC. While the later Pixter Multimedia offers 4MB SDRAM, the Pixter Color's 128KB onboard RAM is insufficient for PalmOS, necessitating external RAM and a custom 48-byte cartridge header for booting.

Significant challenges arise from the Pixter Color's hardware. The cartridge slot's 16-bit data bus lacks byte lane select lines, forcing external RAM to operate in a slower 8-bit mode to maintain byte-addressability. This means a 32-bit memory read can take up to 16 CPU cycles.

The Sharp LH75411 SoC itself is severely under-configured. It lacks a cache, MMU, MPU, and Coprocessor 15. This absence renders the 63MHz CPU highly inefficient, as it constantly waits for memory. It also prevents essential debugging and memory protection features like alignment checking and flexible exception vector relocation, making NULL-pointer trapping impossible. Despite some fast but limited internal memory (16KB TCM, 32KB eSRAM), these deficiencies significantly hamper performance and system robustness.
chinese_title: PalmOS 在 费雪 Pixter 玩具上
chinese_summary:
rePalm项目旨在将PalmOS移植到费雪Pixter Color玩具上，这是一款21世纪初的儿童设备，配备160x160彩色显示屏和夏普LH75411 ARM SoC。尽管后续的Pixter Multimedia提供了4MB SDRAM，但Pixter Color的128KB板载RAM不足以运行PalmOS，因此需要外部RAM以及一个定制的48字节卡带头来启动。

Pixter Color的硬件带来了重大挑战。卡带插槽的16位数据总线缺少字节通道选择线，这迫使外部RAM必须以较慢的8位模式运行，才能保持字节寻址能力。这意味着一次32位内存读取最多可能需要16个CPU周期。

夏普LH75411 SoC本身的配置严重不足。它缺少缓存、MMU、MPU和协处理器15。这种缺失使得63MHz的CPU效率极低，因为它不断地等待内存。它还阻止了对齐检查和灵活的异常向量重定位等重要的调试和内存保护功能，使得NULL指针捕获变得不可能。尽管存在一些快速但有限的内部内存（16KB TCM、32KB eSRAM），但这些缺陷严重阻碍了性能和系统稳定性。

title: Sugars, Gum, Stardust Found in NASA's Asteroid Bennu Samples
summary:
NASA's OSIRIS-REx mission samples from asteroid Bennu have revealed remarkable discoveries, offering new insights into the early solar system and the origins of life. Three new papers detail findings of essential sugars, a mysterious gum-like substance, and an unexpected abundance of supernova dust.

Scientists found ribose, a five-carbon sugar crucial for RNA, and, for the first time in an extraterrestrial sample, six-carbon glucose, an important energy source for life. This discovery, alongside previously found amino acids and nucleobases, indicates that the molecular building blocks of life were widespread in the early solar system. The presence of ribose and lack of deoxyribose supports the "RNA world" hypothesis, suggesting RNA may have been the primary molecule for early life's information storage and reactions.

A never-before-seen gum-like material, rich in nitrogen and oxygen, was also discovered. This ancient "space gum" likely formed early in the solar system as Bennu’s parent asteroid warmed, before it became a watery environment. Akin to a "space plastic" with a hodgepodge chemical structure, this polymer-like substance could have provided chemical precursors for life on Earth.

Finally, the samples contained an unexpectedly high abundance of supernova dust—six times more than any other studied astromaterial. This suggests Bennu's parent body formed in a region of the protoplanetary disk enriched with dust from dying stars. Despite the asteroid's extensive alteration by fluids, pockets of less-altered material reveal the diversity of presolar materials it accreted. These findings collectively enrich our understanding of cosmic chemistry and the potential pathways to life.
chinese_title: NASA贝努小行星样本中发现糖、树胶、星尘
chinese_summary:
NASA的OSIRIS-REx任务从小行星Bennu采集的样本揭示了非凡的发现，为早期太阳系和生命起源提供了新见解。三篇新论文详细介绍了必需糖类、一种神秘的胶状物质以及超新星尘埃的意外丰富发现。

科学家发现了核糖（一种对RNA至关重要的五碳糖），以及首次在地外样本中发现的葡萄糖（一种六碳糖，是生命重要的能量来源）。这一发现，连同此前发现的氨基酸和核碱基，表明生命的分子构建块在早期太阳系中广泛存在。核糖的存在和脱氧核糖的缺失支持了“RNA世界”假说，表明RNA可能是早期生命信息存储和反应的主要分子。

还发现了一种前所未见的、富含氮和氧的胶状物质。这种古老的“太空胶”很可能在太阳系早期，当Bennu的母小行星变暖时形成，早于其成为水环境。类似于具有混杂化学结构的“太空塑料”，这种聚合物状物质可能为地球上的生命提供了化学前体。

最后，样本中含有异常丰富的超新星尘埃——比任何其他已研究的宇宙物质多出六倍。这表明Bennu的母体形成于原行星盘中一个富含垂死恒星尘埃的区域。尽管这颗小行星受到流体广泛改变，但其中未受明显改变的物质袋揭示了它所吸积的前太阳系物质的多样性。这些发现共同丰富了我们对宇宙化学和生命潜在途径的理解。

title: CUDA-l2: Surpassing cuBLAS performance for matrix multiplication through RL
summary:
CUDA-L2 is a novel system leveraging large language models (LLMs) and reinforcement learning (RL) to automatically optimize Half-precision General Matrix Multiply (HGEMM) CUDA kernels. It systematically outperforms established baselines, including `torch.matmul`, cuBLAS, and cuBLASLt variants, demonstrating significant speedups across 1,000 (M,N,K) configurations on NVIDIA A100 GPUs.

As of December 2025, CUDA-L2 has released A100-optimized HGEMM kernels for these 1,000 configurations, currently supporting 16-bit accumulators. Future development aims to include 32-bit accumulators, denser matrix configurations, support for more GPUs (Hopper, Blackwell), and easier deployment for open-source LLMs.

To use CUDA-L2, users need Python, PyTorch 2.6.0+, and must clone CUTLASS v4.2.1. Crucially, `CUTLASS_DIR` and `TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST` (e.g., "8.0" for A100) environment variables must be configured. Evaluation is performed using the `eval_one_file.sh` script, which supports `offline` and `server` modes. Arguments include problem size (`--mnk`), warmup and benchmark durations, output directory, GPU device ID, and target Queries Per Second (`--target_qps`) for server mode. While A100 kernels are optimized for A100, custom matrix dimensions can be requested.
chinese_title: CUDA-l2: 通过强化学习超越 cuBLAS 的矩阵乘法性能
chinese_summary:
CUDA-L2是一个新颖的系统，它利用大语言模型（LLMs）和强化学习（RL）自动优化半精度通用矩阵乘法（HGEMM）CUDA核函数。它系统性地超越了包括`torch.matmul`、cuBLAS和cuBLASLt变体在内的现有基线，在NVIDIA A100 GPU上跨1,000种（M,N,K）配置展现出显著的加速。

截至2025年12月，CUDA-L2已针对这1,000种配置发布了A100优化的HGEMM核函数，目前支持16位累加器。未来的开发目标包括支持32位累加器、更密集的矩阵配置、支持更多GPU（Hopper、Blackwell），以及更简便地部署开源LLMs。

要使用CUDA-L2，用户需要Python、PyTorch 2.6.0+，并必须克隆CUTLASS v4.2.1。关键是，必须配置`CUTLASS_DIR`和`TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST`（例如，A100为"8.0"）环境变量。评估通过`eval_one_file.sh`脚本执行，该脚本支持`offline`（离线）和`server`（服务器）模式。参数包括问题大小（`--mnk`）、预热和基准测试持续时间、输出目录、GPU设备ID以及服务器模式下的目标每秒查询次数（`--target_qps`）。虽然A100核函数已针对A100进行优化，但仍可请求自定义矩阵维度。

title: Autism's confusing cousins
summary:
Awais Aftab's "Autism's Confusing Cousins" explores the widespread self-diagnosis of autism for symptoms like social awkwardness, rigid routines, or intense focus. The author, a psychiatrist, acknowledges autism's reality but argues that many individuals exhibiting these traits might actually have other conditions, often unrecognized due to autism's "mimetic virality" and greater public awareness.

Common self-reported "autistic" traits often align with anxiety disorders or other psychiatric conditions in a clinician's view. Autism is appealing as a diagnosis because it offers a recognized narrative for "weird" or awkward experiences and provides access to crucial services and support that lesser-known diagnoses lack.

The article details several "cousin" conditions that mimic autism but have distinct underlying mechanisms:
*   **Schizoid Personality:** Social disinterest rather than processing difficulty.
*   **Schizotypal Personality:** Odd beliefs, magical thinking, and perceptual distortions.
*   **Obsessive-Compulsive Personality:** Inflexibility stemming from anxiety and a need for control.
*   **Social Phobia:** Intense fear of social judgment, often improving in safe environments.
*   **Borderline Personality:** Emotional instability and chaotic relationships, distinct from autism's stable self-concept and sensory issues.
*   **Social Communication Disorder:** Autism's social communication difficulties *without* repetitive behaviors or restricted interests, often under-diagnosed due to lack of associated services.
*   **Trauma-Related Disorders:** Social withdrawal as a defensive response.

Aftab stresses that autism diagnosis is a clinical judgment, not a medical test, and accurate differential diagnosis is vital, emphasizing that a person's difficulties are not dismissed, but rather attributed to the most fitting of numerous diagnostic possibilities.
chinese_title: 自闭症的“易混淆近亲”
chinese_summary:
阿瓦伊斯·阿夫塔布（Awais Aftab）的《自闭症的迷惑表亲们》一文探讨了针对社交笨拙、刻板作息或高度专注等症状而广泛出现的自闭症自我诊断现象。作者作为一名精神病学家，承认自闭症的真实性，但认为许多表现出这些特质的人，实际上可能患有其他疾病。这些疾病常因自闭症的“模仿式传播”和更高的公众认知度而未被识别。

在临床医生看来，常见的、自我报告的“自闭症”特质常常与焦虑症或其他精神疾病相符。自闭症作为一种诊断具有吸引力，因为它为“古怪”或尴尬的经历提供了一个公认的解释，并提供了关键的服务和支持，而这些是鲜为人知的诊断所缺乏的。

文章详细列举了几种模仿自闭症但具有不同潜在机制的“表亲”病症：
*   **分裂样人格障碍：** 表现为缺乏社交兴趣，而非社交处理困难。
*   **分裂型人格障碍：** 奇异信念、魔法思维和知觉扭曲。
*   **强迫型人格障碍：** 源于焦虑和对控制的需求而表现出的僵化。
*   **社交恐惧症：** 对社会评判的强烈恐惧，在安全环境中常有改善。
*   **边缘性人格障碍：** 情绪不稳定和混乱的人际关系，这与自闭症的稳定自我概念和感觉问题不同。
*   **社交沟通障碍：** 具有自闭症的社交沟通困难，但没有重复行为或局限兴趣，常因缺乏相关服务而诊断不足。
*   **创伤相关障碍：** 社交退缩作为一种防御反应。

阿夫塔布强调，自闭症诊断是一种临床判断，而非医学检测，准确的鉴别诊断至关重要。他强调，一个人的困难并非被否认，而是被归因于众多诊断可能性中最合适的一种。

title: The missing standard library for multithreading in JavaScript
summary:
"Multithreading.js" is a TypeScript library that provides robust, Rust-inspired concurrency primitives for JavaScript, abstracting away the complexities of Web Workers, serialization, and SharedArrayBuffer. It offers a managed thread pool, strict memory safety semantics, and aims to make multi-threaded code feel like standard asynchronous JavaScript.

The library's core is the `spawn` function, which submits tasks to a worker pool and returns an awaitable handle. Data transfer to workers is managed by `move()`, which either performs zero-copy "moves" for Transferable Objects (e.g., ArrayBuffer) or clones other data. `SharedJsonBuffer` facilitates efficient, Mutex-protected sharing of JSON objects in shared memory, optimizing for persistent or frequently accessed complex data.

Key synchronization primitives include:
*   **Mutex:** Ensures exclusive access to shared data.
*   **RwLock:** Optimizes for read-heavy scenarios, allowing multiple readers or a single writer.
*   **Semaphore:** Limits the number of threads concurrently accessing a resource.
*   **Condvar:** Allows threads to efficiently wait for specific conditions without busy-waiting.
The library strongly recommends using asynchronous methods (e.g., `acquire`, `read`, `write`, `wait`) and supports the `using` keyword for automatic lock release.

For higher-level communication, Multi-Producer, Multi-Consumer (MPMC) `channels` provide a bounded, thread-safe queue for arbitrary JSON data, simplifying inter-worker coordination and handling backpressure. Workers also support standard dynamic `await import()` for both relative local files and external modules.

Browser compatibility for core features is broad, but synchronization primitives requiring `SharedArrayBuffer` necessitate Cross-Origin Isolation (specific HTTP headers). Applications using Content Security Policy (CSP) must permit `data:` and `blob:` URLs for worker entry points.
chinese_title: JavaScript缺失的多线程标准库
chinese_summary:
"Multithreading.js" 是一个 TypeScript 库，它为 JavaScript 提供了健壮的、受 Rust 启发的并发原语，抽象化了 Web Workers、序列化和 SharedArrayBuffer 的复杂性。它提供了一个托管线程池、严格的内存安全语义，旨在让多线程代码感觉像标准的异步 JavaScript。

该库的核心是 `spawn` 函数，它将任务提交到工作池并返回一个可等待的句柄。数据传输到 worker 由 `move()` 管理，它对可转移对象（例如 ArrayBuffer）执行零拷贝“移动”，或克隆其他数据。`SharedJsonBuffer` 促进了在共享内存中高效、受 Mutex 保护的 JSON 对象共享，针对持久或频繁访问的复杂数据进行了优化。

关键同步原语包括：
*   **互斥锁 (Mutex)：** 确保对共享数据的独占访问。
*   **读写锁 (RwLock)：** 针对读密集型场景进行优化，允许多个读取者或单个写入者。
*   **信号量 (Semaphore)：** 限制同时访问资源的线程数量。
*   **条件变量 (Condvar)：** 允许线程高效地等待特定条件而无需忙等待。
该库强烈建议使用异步方法（例如 `acquire`、`read`、`write`、`wait`），并支持 `using` 关键字用于自动释放锁。

对于更高级别的通信，多生产者-多消费者 (MPMC) `通道` 为任意 JSON 数据提供了一个有界、线程安全的队列，简化了 worker 间的协调和背压处理。Worker 也支持标准的动态 `await import()`，可用于相对本地文件和外部模块。

核心功能的浏览器兼容性广泛，但需要 `SharedArrayBuffer` 的同步原语必须进行跨域隔离（特定的 HTTP 头）。使用内容安全策略 (CSP) 的应用程序必须允许 `data:` 和 `blob:` URL 作为 worker 入口点。

title: CJEU has made it effectively impossible to run a user-generated platform legally
summary:
The article asserts that recent rulings by the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) have made it "effectively impossible" for user-generated content (UGC) platforms to operate legally.

The core issue highlighted is a direct contradiction between the CJEU's implications for platforms and existing EU rules. Specifically, the author points out that these new requirements clash with the EU’s own prohibitions against imposing general monitoring obligations on platforms. This conflict is described as an "ouroboros situation," a self-defeating or circular dilemma where compliance with one set of regulations appears to violate another. The article concludes by emphasizing the significant and paradoxical challenge this presents for the EU to resolve.
chinese_title: 欧盟法院实际上已令用户生成内容平台无法合法运营。
chinese_summary:
该文章指出，欧洲法院（CJEU）的近期裁决已使得用户生成内容（UGC）平台合法运营“实际上不可能”。

文章强调的核心问题在于，欧洲法院对平台的要求与现有欧盟规则之间存在直接矛盾。具体而言，作者指出这些新要求与欧盟自身禁止对平台施加普遍监控义务的规定相抵触。这种冲突被描述为一种“衔尾蛇困境”，即一种自我挫败或循环困境，其中遵守一套法规似乎又违反了另一套法规。文章最后强调，这给欧盟解决这一问题带来了重大而自相矛盾的挑战。

title: HTML as an Accessible Format for Papers
summary:
arXiv has launched HTML papers as an accessible format, aiming to address urgent accessibility barriers in research by complementing existing PDFs. This initiative helps users of screen readers, magnifiers, and mobile devices. HTML versions are being gradually backfilled across arXiv's 2 million-plus paper corpus, with authors able to preview HTML during submission.

The "experimental" nature of the HTML launch stems from the significant challenge of rapidly and automatically converting diverse LaTeX submissions to HTML. LaTeX's extensibility means varied usage, making precise conversion difficult and leading to expected rendering issues. Despite these challenges, the launch proceeded due to the community's urgent demand for accessible papers and the need for collective feedback.

To improve the system, arXiv encourages community involvement. Readers should try HTML papers and report functional issues like incorrect or illegible layouts. It's important to note that HTML papers will render differently than PDFs, prioritizing adaptability and accessibility over exact visual replication. Authors can contribute by following LaTeX Markup Best Practices, while developers can assist the LaTeXML project. Publishers and societies can help by recommending LaTeX `.cls` files that use supported packages.

arXiv expresses gratitude to scientists with disabilities for their insights, and to The LaTeX Project and the LaTeXML team from NIST for their critical work in making this accessibility initiative possible.
chinese_title: HTML：论文的可访问格式
chinese_summary:
arXiv已推出HTML格式论文作为一种无障碍格式，旨在通过补充现有PDF来解决研究领域中迫切的可访问性障碍。这一举措有助于屏幕阅读器、放大镜和移动设备的用户。HTML版本正在逐步回填到arXiv超过200万篇论文的语料库中，作者在提交时可以预览HTML版本。

HTML版本发布的“实验性”在于将各种LaTeX提交文档快速、自动地转换为HTML的巨大挑战。LaTeX的可扩展性意味着其使用方式多样，使得精确转换变得困难，并导致预期的渲染问题。尽管存在这些挑战，但由于社区对无障碍论文的迫切需求以及收集集体反馈的需要，该版本仍得以发布。

为了改进系统，arXiv鼓励社区参与。读者应尝试使用HTML论文并报告功能问题，例如不正确或难以辨认的布局。需要注意的是，HTML论文的渲染方式将与PDF不同，优先考虑适应性和可访问性，而非精确的视觉复刻。作者可以通过遵循LaTeX标记最佳实践做出贡献，开发人员可以协助LaTeXML项目。出版商和学会可以通过推荐使用受支持包的LaTeX `.cls` 文件来提供帮助。

arXiv感谢残疾科学家提供的宝贵见解，并感谢LaTeX项目以及NIST的LaTeXML团队，他们的关键工作使这一无障碍倡议得以实现。

title: Linux Instal Fest Belgrade
summary:
The "Linux Install Fest Belgrade," organized by Decentrala, will be held on December 9, 2025, from 6 pm to 9 pm at the JAG3 classroom, Faculty of Mathematics, Jagićeva 5, Belgrade. The primary goal is to help attendees install the Linux operating system on their laptops, with experienced users providing assistance. Depending on interest, short trainings on topics like the command line, Git, and C programming may also be offered.

This event is part of the "End of 10" campaign, promoting Linux as a replacement for Windows 10. The text highlights Windows' increasing unfriendliness, forced functionalities (cloud, AI, ads, mandatory accounts), and hardware demands contributing to e-waste. Conversely, Linux offers a more pleasant user experience, works well on older hardware, and aligns with environmental responsibility.

Recommended Linux distributions for beginners include Debian (and its derivatives like Ubuntu, Mint) and Fedora. Arch is suggested for experienced users. Linux can be installed in three ways: within a virtual machine, dual-booting alongside Windows, or by completely replacing Windows.

Crucially, attendees opting for dual-boot or full replacement *must* back up their data from the system partition before arrival. Exploring distributions online via DistroSea is also recommended.

Decentrala will host two related events at the same location: "Introduction to the Linux command line" on December 16 and "Introduction to Git" on December 23, both starting at 6 pm. The fest also serves as a collection point for defective electronic devices, which will be donated to the "Ponovo" organization for repair and e-waste reduction.
chinese_title: 贝尔格莱德 Linux 安装节
chinese_summary:
由Decentrala组织的“贝尔格莱德Linux安装节”将于2025年12月9日晚6点至9点在贝尔格莱德Jagićeva 5号数学系JAG3教室举行。主要目标是帮助参与者在他们的笔记本电脑上安装Linux操作系统，届时将有经验丰富的用户提供协助。根据参与者的兴趣，活动可能还会提供关于命令行、Git和C语言编程等主题的短期培训。

本次活动是“终结Windows 10”活动的一部分，旨在推广Linux作为Windows 10的替代品。原文指出Windows日益增长的不友好性、强制功能（云服务、AI、广告、强制账户）以及导致电子垃圾的硬件要求。与此相反，Linux提供了更愉悦的用户体验，在旧硬件上也能良好运行，并符合环保理念。

推荐初学者使用的Linux发行版包括Debian（及其衍生版，如Ubuntu、Mint）和Fedora。Arch则推荐给有经验的用户。Linux可以通过三种方式安装：在虚拟机中安装、与Windows双系统启动，或完全取代Windows。

至关重要的是，选择双系统启动或完全取代Windows的参与者在抵达前*务必*备份其系统分区中的数据。此外，也建议通过DistroSea在线探索不同的发行版。

Decentrala还将在同一地点举办两场相关活动：12月16日的“Linux命令行入门”和12月23日的“Git入门”，两场活动均于晚6点开始。本次安装节还将作为废旧电子设备的收集点，这些设备将捐赠给“Ponovo”组织进行维修，以减少电子垃圾。

title: Perpetual futures, explained
summary:
Perpetual futures (perps) are the dominant way crypto trades by volume, offering continuous cash-settled contracts without physical delivery. Though predating crypto, they were popularized there to provide speculative risk while reducing the capital requirements for exchanges and market makers, who otherwise need to hold significant idle assets to ensure trust and pay winnings.

Unlike traditional futures, perps settle multiple times a day via "funding rates." Winners are paid by losers, and these rates, which can be capped and include an interest component, help keep perp prices aligned with the underlying spot price. When perps trade above spot, sophisticated market makers execute a "basis trade" (short perp, buy spot). This delta-neutral strategy profits from funding rates and helps converge prices, while also renting access to their capital for leverage. However, market makers also underwrite the exchange, risking their collateral if the exchange fails.

Perps offer extreme leverage (routinely 20x-100x, far exceeding traditional markets), which appeals to gamblers but carries significant risk. Exchanges profit from liquidating overleveraged traders, with "insurance funds" typically covering shortfalls. However, in extreme market movements, the system's capital efficiency has a breaking point. When insurance funds are insufficient, "automatic deleveraging" (ADL) kicks in, retroactively reducing winners' profits to balance the market, a critical and often misunderstood tail risk for all participants.
chinese_title: 永续合约详解
chinese_summary:
永续合约是加密货币交易量最大的方式，提供连续的现金结算合约，无需实物交割。尽管它早于加密货币出现，但在加密领域普及，旨在提供投机风险，同时降低交易所和做市商的资本要求，否则他们需要持有大量闲置资产以确保信任并支付盈利。

与传统期货不同，永续合约每天通过“资金费率”进行多次结算。赢家由输家支付，这些可以设置上限并包含利息成分的费率，有助于使永续合约价格与标的现货价格保持一致。当永续合约价格高于现货时，精明的做市商会执行“基差交易”（做空永续合约，买入现货）。这种delta中性策略从资金费率中获利，有助于价格趋同，同时也能通过他们的资本提供杠杆。然而，做市商也为交易所提供担保，如果交易所失败，他们的抵押品将面临风险。

永续合约提供极高的杠杆（通常是20倍-100倍，远超传统市场），这吸引了投机者，但也带来了巨大的风险。交易所通过清算过度杠杆的交易者获利，而“保险基金”通常用于弥补不足。然而，在极端市场波动中，系统的资本效率存在临界点。当保险基金不足时，“自动去杠杆”（ADL）机制启动，追溯性地减少赢家的利润以平衡市场，这对所有参与者来说都是一个关键且常被误解的尾部风险。

title: StardustOS: Library operating system for building light-weight Unikernels
summary:
StardustOS is a unikernel operating system designed for cloud applications, operating within a protected, single-address space. It delegates physical resource management to a trusted underlying hypervisor. Stardust features a small, maintainable codebase, utilizing static linking to combine a minimal kernel with a single application, its libraries, and runtime into an immutable, single-purpose virtual machine image. It supports multiple cores, preemptive threads, basic block and networking drivers, and provides POSIX-compatible libraries.

The system is used for teaching and research at the University of St Andrews. Related projects include:
*   **Stardust:** The original unikernel implementation in C.
*   **Stardust-oxide:** A re-implementation of the unikernel in Rust.
*   **Duster:** A debugger for C unikernels running on the Xen hypervisor.

Researchers have presented numerous talks and published materials on Stardust, covering topics like unikernel support for Lambda functions, debugging, distributed microservices, and the general case for unikernels, primarily at the UK System Research Challenges Workshops and university seminars. A dissertation on Stardust Oxide is also noted.
chinese_title: StardustOS：构建轻量级独立内核的库操作系统
chinese_summary:
StardustOS是一个专为云应用设计的独内核操作系统，它在一个受保护的单一地址空间内运行，并将物理资源管理委托给可信的底层虚拟机管理程序。Stardust的代码库小巧且易于维护，它利用静态链接将一个最小化的内核与单个应用程序、其库和运行时环境结合成一个不可变、单一用途的虚拟机镜像。它支持多核、抢占式线程、基本的块设备和网络驱动程序，并提供POSIX兼容的库。

该系统在圣安德鲁斯大学用于教学和研究。相关项目包括：
*   **Stardust:** 原始的C语言独内核实现。
*   **Stardust-oxide:** 使用Rust语言对独内核的重新实现。
*   **Duster:** 一个用于在Xen虚拟机管理程序上运行的C语言独内核的调试器。

研究人员就Stardust发表了大量演讲并发布了相关材料，涵盖的主题包括独内核对Lambda函数的支持、调试、分布式微服务以及独内核的通用应用场景，这些主要在英国系统研究挑战研讨会和大学研讨会上进行。此外，一篇关于Stardust Oxide的学位论文也值得关注。

title: Perl's decline was cultural
summary:
The article argues that Perl's decline was primarily cultural, rooted in its UNIX sysadmin origins. The author, who worked extensively with Perl from the mid-90s to 2005, describes a "BOFH" culture characterized by tribalism, gatekeeping, valuing difficulty ("foot guns") as a mark of skill, and knowledge hoarding. This mentality fostered a conservative environment where approachability was viewed as cheapening achievements.

This cultural conservatism paradoxically manifested in "TIMTOWTDI" (There Is More Than One Way To Do It), which, while ostensibly flexible, discouraged core language changes by pushing innovation to CPAN (Comprehensive Perl Archive Network). This approach, though seemingly reasonable, contributed to "dependency hell" and a fragmentation of approaches.

The creation of Perl 6 is presented not as the cause, but a symptom of irreconcilable internal forces. The community schism saw Perl 5 double down on stability (excusing lack of modern features by pointing to Perl 6), while Perl 6 embarked on an extended, design-heavy innovation journey that failed to deliver quickly.

During this period, competitors like Ruby on Rails emerged, offering opinionated frameworks, a welcoming culture, and easy onboarding. PHP, with its "zero gate-keeping" approach and simple deployment, also gained massive traction, especially with the blogging boom. Perl, with its internal conflicts, complex ecosystem, and a culture often contemptuous of newcomers, became significantly less attractive, ceding its dominance in backend web programming.
chinese_title: Perl的衰落是文化性的
chinese_summary:
文章认为，Perl的衰落主要是文化上的，根植于其UNIX系统管理员的起源。作者从90年代中期到2005年大量使用Perl，他描述了一种“BOFH”文化，其特点是部落主义、门户之见、珍视难度（“自伤武器”）作为技能的标志，以及知识囤积。这种心态培养了一种保守的环境，在这种环境下，易用性被视为贬低成就。

这种文化保守主义却以一种矛盾的方式体现在“TIMTOWTDI”（There Is More Than One Way To Do It，即“不止一种方法可以做到”）中，这种做法表面上很灵活，却通过将创新推向CPAN（Comprehensive Perl Archive Network）阻碍了核心语言的变革。这种方法看似合理，却导致了“依赖地狱”和方法论的碎片化。

Perl 6的创建并非原因，而是内部不可调和矛盾的体现。社区分裂导致Perl 5加倍强调稳定性（以Perl 6为借口，解释其缺乏现代功能），而Perl 6则踏上了一条漫长、重设计但未能迅速交付的创新之路。

在此期间，Ruby on Rails等竞争者涌现，提供有主见的框架、欢迎新人的文化和简单的上手体验。PHP凭借其“零门槛”的方法和简单的部署，也获得了巨大的吸引力，尤其是在博客热潮中。Perl则因其内部冲突、复杂的生态系统以及一种常常蔑视新人的文化，变得吸引力大减，从而失去了在后端网络编程领域的主导地位。

title: Fizz Buzz in CSS
summary:
Susam Pal's article, "Fizz Buzz in CSS," challenges readers to implement the classic Fizz Buzz sequence using the fewest possible lines of CSS, under strict rules. The core constraint is that all output, including both numbers and words ("Fizz," "Buzz"), must originate *directly* from the CSS stylesheet, explicitly forbidding JavaScript, plain HTML text, or relying on HTML features like `<ol>`'s automatic list numbering.

Pal proposes a four-line CSS solution using `<li>` elements and CSS counters. It works by:
1.  Incrementing a counter `n` for each `<li>`.
2.  Displaying `counter(n)` for `<li>` elements that are not multiples of 5 (handling regular numbers).
3.  Overriding this to display "Fizz" for multiples of 3.
4.  Appending "Buzz" for multiples of 5.

The author dismisses common tricks like using `<ol>`, stating they violate the "CSS-only output" rule and result in untidy, misaligned displays. While the primary goal is line minimization, the article also briefly discusses byte count optimization, providing a minified version of the solution (152 bytes) and suggesting further reductions. The post aims to showcase the capabilities of CSS through this intriguing puzzle.
chinese_title: CSS 中的 Fizz Buzz
chinese_summary:
Susam Pal 的文章《CSS 中的 Fizz Buzz》挑战读者在严格规则下，用尽可能少的 CSS 代码行实现经典的 Fizz Buzz 序列。核心限制是所有输出，包括数字和单词（"Fizz"、"Buzz"），都必须*直接*源自 CSS 样式表，明确禁止使用 JavaScript、纯 HTML 文本，或依赖 `<ol>` 自动列表编号等 HTML 特性。

Pal 提出了一种使用 `<li>` 元素和 CSS 计数器的四行 CSS 解决方案。其工作原理是：
1. 为每个 `<li>` 递增计数器 `n`。
2. 对于非 5 的倍数的 `<li>` 元素显示 `counter(n)`（处理常规数字）。
3. 将其覆盖，使 3 的倍数显示为 "Fizz"。
4. 为 5 的倍数追加 "Buzz"。

作者驳斥了使用 `<ol>` 等常见技巧，指出它们违反了“仅限 CSS 输出”的规则，并导致显示不整洁、不对齐。虽然主要目标是最小化代码行数，文章也简要讨论了字节数优化，提供了一个解决方案的压缩版本（152 字节）并提出了进一步缩减的建议。这篇文章旨在通过这个有趣的谜题展示 CSS 的能力。

title: The AI Backlash Is Here: Why Public Patience with Tech Giants Is Running Out
summary:
Public patience with AI is rapidly eroding, shifting from initial optimism to widespread cynicism and open hostility. What began as hope for generative AI to simplify lives has morphed into frustration over its perceived benefits primarily serving wealthy tech giants, not solving real problems, and producing a flood of low-quality, "slop" content.

Evidence of this backlash includes widespread mockery and vandalism of AI-generated ads, like Friend's subway campaign being defaced with "surveillance capitalism" tags, and Skechers' AI ads criticized as "lazy." Artists like Bad Bunny and Drake have lashed out against unauthorized AI voice cloning. Pew Research indicates a significant shift, with 43% of U.S. adults believing AI is more likely to harm than help them.

Experts argue that AI is "wildly oversold" and its "inevitable future" narrative is used to displace workers, automate without accountability, and exploit data without consent. This concern is reflected in Gen Z's "clanker" meme for AI replacing jobs.

Despite massive investments—over $320 billion in the first half of 2025, heavily backed by U.S. hyperscalers and political figures—experts warn of an unsustainable bubble. Much spending appears to outpace plausible economic returns, fueled by "circular investment patterns" among AI companies rather than genuine customer demand. The industry remains largely unprofitable at scale, facing a projected $800 billion revenue shortfall by 2030 to meet data center demands, suggesting an "unsustainable model" and a potential bubble with wide-ranging impacts.
chinese_title: AI反噬已至：公众对科技巨头的耐心为何殆尽
chinese_summary:
公众对人工智能的耐心正在迅速消磨，从最初的乐观情绪转变为普遍的怀疑和公开的敌意。最初对生成式AI能简化生活的希望，已演变为对其感知到的好处主要服务于富裕科技巨头、未能解决实际问题并产生大量低质量“垃圾”内容的失望。

这种反弹的证据包括对AI生成广告的普遍嘲讽和破坏，例如Friend公司在地铁的广告被涂鸦上“监控资本主义”的标签，以及Skechers的AI广告被批“懒惰”。Bad Bunny和Drake等艺术家已公开抨击未经授权的AI声音克隆。皮尤研究中心的数据显示，这种转变非常显著，43%的美国成年人认为AI更有可能伤害而非帮助他们。

专家认为，AI被“过度吹捧”，其“不可避免的未来”叙事被用来取代工人、在没有问责的情况下实现自动化，以及未经同意滥用数据。Z世代用“clanker”梗来指代AI取代工作，也反映了这种担忧。

尽管投资巨大——2025年上半年超过3200亿美元，主要由美国超大规模企业和政治人物支持——专家们仍警告存在不可持续的泡沫。大部分支出似乎超过了合理的经济回报，其驱动力是AI公司之间“循环投资模式”而非真正的客户需求。该行业在大规模运营上仍普遍无利可图，预计到2030年将面临8000亿美元的收入缺口，以满足数据中心需求，这预示着一个“不可持续的模式”和一个可能产生广泛影响的潜在泡沫。

title: WikiFlix: Full Movies Hosted on Wikimedia Commons
summary:
WikiFlix is a prototype hosted on Wikimedia Commons, offering a platform to browse and watch full-length, public domain or Creative Commons-licensed films. Powered by Wikidata, it aims to provide free access to a vast collection of movies, with an alternative, standalone application available on Toolforge.

Users can navigate films through various categories: by decade and specific year (from 1870s to 2020s), by genre (e.g., Abstract, Animated, Documentary, Science fiction), by country (e.g., France, India, United States), by director (e.g., Walt Disney, Sergei Eisenstein), by actor (e.g., Charlie Chaplin), or even by character (e.g., Mickey Mouse). Special lists also highlight films by female directors, LGBT+ directors, and those in the US National Film Registry.

A substantial section is dedicated to "Films that have won awards," which is periodically updated by a bot. This list details numerous award-winning movies, categorized by the specific accolades they received. Examples include various Academy Awards (Best Picture, Director, Actor, Actress, Documentary, etc.), Annecy Cristal, Filmfare Awards, Hundred Flowers Award, Mussolini Cup, National Board of Review, National Film Awards, Palme d'Or, Silver Bear, and Stalin Prize. For each entry, details like the film's title, year, duration, genres, director, and country of origin are provided.
chinese_title: 维基飞：托管于维基媒体共享资源的完整电影
chinese_summary:
WikiFlix是一个托管在维基共享资源上的原型，提供一个平台用于浏览和观看完整长度的、属于公共领域或知识共享许可的电影。它由维基数据驱动，旨在提供对海量电影收藏的免费访问，并在Toolforge上提供一个替代的独立应用程序。

用户可以通过多种类别浏览电影：按年代和具体年份（从19世纪70年代到21世纪20年代），按类型（例如，抽象片、动画片、纪录片、科幻片），按国家（例如，法国、印度、美国），按导演（例如，华特·迪士尼、谢尔盖·爱森斯坦），按演员（例如，查理·卓别林），甚至按角色（例如，米奇老鼠）。特别列表还突出显示了由女性导演、LGBT+导演执导的电影，以及被列入美国国家电影登记部的影片。

一个重要的部分专门用于“获奖影片”，由机器人定期更新。该列表详细列出了众多获奖电影，并根据它们所获得的具体奖项进行分类。例子包括各类奥斯卡金像奖（最佳影片、导演、男主角、女主角、纪录片等）、安锡水晶奖、印度电影观众奖、百花奖、墨索里尼杯、国家评论协会奖、印度国家电影奖、金棕榈奖、银熊奖和斯大林奖。每个条目都提供电影的片名、年份、时长、类型、导演和原产国等详细信息。

title: Touching the Elephant – TPUs
summary:
Google's Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) is a pioneering hardware accelerator, born over a decade ago from the necessity to meet the exploding computational demands of deep learning as Moore's Law and Dennard Scaling slowed. Recognizing in 2013 that scaling datacenters with general-purpose hardware was unsustainable, Google designed specialized silicon.

TPUs are Domain Specific Accelerators, trading generality for performance by focusing on linear algebra operations, particularly matrix multiplication, which are central to neural networks. This approach optimizes for high compute-to-data access ratios and minimizes energy waste associated with control flow and general memory access in traditional processors.

The first generation, TPUv1, targeted *inference*. It was a single-threaded co-processor featuring a 256x256 8-bit integer systolic array (Matrix Multiplication Unit - MXU), a software-controlled Unified Buffer, and DDR3 DRAM. Its spartan design, devoid of complex caches or branch prediction, relied on deterministic execution and precisely coordinated data movement, often using double buffering, to maximize MXU utilization. This resulted in significant performance and power efficiency gains (15-30x inference speed, 30-80x perf/W) over contemporary GPUs.

TPUv2 was developed for *training*, requiring greater flexibility. It featured a dual-core architecture, each core integrating programmable vector units, local SRAM, HBM, and a 128x128 MXU. Key advancements included Inter-Core Interconnects (ICI) for multi-chip communication and the adoption of BrainFloat16 (BF16) floating-point format, vital for the higher precision and dynamic range needed for gradient calculations during neural network training. This generation allowed for more diverse and programmable activation functions, reflecting evolving algorithmic needs.
chinese_title: 盲人摸象 – TPUs
chinese_summary:
谷歌的张量处理单元（TPU）是一种开创性的硬件加速器，十多年前诞生，源于在摩尔定律和登纳德定律减速背景下，为满足深度学习爆炸性计算需求而生。谷歌在2013年认识到，使用通用硬件扩展数据中心是不可持续的，因此设计了专用芯片。

TPU是领域专用加速器，通过专注于线性代数运算，尤其是神经网络核心的矩阵乘法，以牺牲通用性换取性能。这种方法优化了高计算/数据访问比，并最大程度地减少了传统处理器中与控制流和通用内存访问相关的能量浪费。

第一代TPUv1面向*推理*。它是一个单线程协处理器，配备一个256x256的8位整数脉动阵列（矩阵乘法单元 - MXU）、一个软件控制的统一缓冲区和DDR3 DRAM。其精简设计，不含复杂的缓存或分支预测，依赖确定性执行和精确协调的数据移动（常采用双缓冲），以最大化MXU利用率。这使得它相对于当时的GPU在性能和功耗效率方面取得了显著提升（推理速度提升15-30倍，性能/功耗比提升30-80倍）。

TPUv2是为*训练*而开发的，需要更高的灵活性。它采用双核架构，每个核心集成了可编程向量单元、本地SRAM、HBM和一个128x128的MXU。主要进步包括用于多芯片通信的核间互连（ICI）以及BrainFloat16（BF16）浮点格式的采用，这对于神经网络训练过程中梯度计算所需的更高精度和动态范围至关重要。这一代允许更多样化和可编程的激活函数，反映了不断发展的算法需求。

title: The Ofcom Files, Part 4: Ofcom Rides Again
summary:
"The Ofcom Files, Part 4" details the ongoing dispute between the UK's censorship agency, Ofcom, and US companies, specifically 4chan. Ofcom sent another "threatening letter" to 4chan, expanding an investigation after the company refused to pay fines. The letter, deemed "legally illiterate nonsense" by the author, claims extraterritorial power to enforce UK censorship laws against Americans in the US.

Preston Byrne, representing 4chan, issued a strong reply. He referenced the potential introduction of a federal GRANITE Act in the US Congress—a foreign censorship shield law inspired by Ofcom's previous actions. Byrne stated unequivocally that 4chan would not implement Ofcom's "age assurance" rules, asserting they would destroy anonymity protected by the First Amendment. He clarified that 4chan cooperates quietly with genuine law enforcement on child safety but would not work with Ofcom, which he views as a censorship agency lacking law enforcement competence. Byrne emphasized that his US clients do not answer to Ofcom due to the First Amendment, copying US government officials. The author expresses optimism that US federal legislation will soon protect American entities from such foreign overreach.
chinese_title: Ofcom档案，第四部分：Ofcom卷土重来
chinese_summary:
《Ofcom文件，第四部分》详细介绍了英国审查机构Ofcom与美国公司，特别是4chan之间持续的纠纷。Ofcom再次向4chan发出“威胁信”，在该公司拒绝支付罚款后扩大了调查范围。作者称该信是“法律上文盲般的胡言乱语”，声称拥有域外权力，旨在对身在美国的美国人执行英国的审查法律。

代表4chan的普雷斯顿·伯恩（Preston Byrne）发出了强硬回应。他提到了美国国会可能引入联邦《花岗岩法案》（GRANITE Act），这是一部受Ofcom此前行动启发、旨在反制外国审查的法律。伯恩明确表示，4chan不会实施Ofcom的“年龄验证”规则，坚称这些规则将破坏受第一修正案保护的匿名性。他澄清说，4chan在儿童安全问题上私下配合真正的执法机构，但不会与Ofcom合作，他将Ofcom视为一个缺乏执法能力的审查机构。伯恩强调，由于第一修正案，他的美国客户不受Ofcom管辖，同时抄送了美国政府官员。作者表示乐观，认为美国联邦立法将很快保护美国实体免受此类境外越权行为。

title: Blogging in 2025: Screaming into the Void
summary:
The author reflects on the dramatic shift from the "old web" of decentralized personal blogs to today's internet, dominated by centralized social media platforms. They identify two major threats to the open web: the pervasive use of AI and the rise of paid content. AI search tools now summarize information directly from various sources, including blogs, reducing the need for users to visit original websites. Concurrently, high-quality content is increasingly moving behind paywalls (e.g., newsletters), benefiting writers but diminishing the open, accessible web.

Despite these challenges, the author feels a nostalgic pull to blog again. They detail using AI coding tools, not to create complex new features, but to simplify their existing blog software. This involved removing external JavaScript trackers and third-party dependencies like Google Fonts, streamlining the HTML/CSS for a minimal, responsive design, and migrating from an unmaintained framework to a simple static site generation script. The goal was to align with "open web hygiene" values.

Their minimalist blogs, including "mijnrealiteit," are now live. Having removed all visitor trackers, the author acknowledges they won't know who reads their posts, concluding that they are "screaming into the void."
chinese_title: 2025年博客：向虚空呐喊
chinese_summary:
作者反思了从去中心化个人博客的“旧网络”到如今由中心化社交媒体平台主导的互联网的巨大转变。他们指出了开放网络的两个主要威胁：人工智能的普遍使用和付费内容的兴起。人工智能搜索工具现在直接从各种来源（包括博客）总结信息，减少了用户访问原始网站的需求。与此同时，高质量内容正越来越多地转移到付费墙后（例如，时事通讯），这虽然对写作者有利，但却削弱了开放、可访问的网络。

尽管面临这些挑战，作者仍被一种怀旧情绪驱使，想再次写博客。他们详细描述了如何使用AI编码工具，不是为了创建复杂的新功能，而是为了简化其现有的博客软件。这包括移除外部JavaScript跟踪器和像Google Fonts这样的第三方依赖，精简HTML/CSS以实现极简、响应式设计，并从一个无人维护的框架迁移到一个简单的静态网站生成脚本。其目标是符合“开放网络卫生”的价值观。

他们的极简主义博客，包括“mijnrealiteit”，现已上线。在移除了所有访客跟踪器后，作者承认他们将不知道谁在阅读他们的文章，并总结说他们是在“对着虚空呐喊”。

title: Jony Ive's OpenAI Device Barred From Using 'io' Name
summary:
A U.S. appeals court has upheld a temporary restraining order, preventing OpenAI and Jony Ive's new hardware venture from using the name "io" for products similar to those planned by AI audio startup iyO.

iyO sued earlier this year, arguing that OpenAI's planned "io" branding was too close to its own name for similar AI-driven hardware. Court filings revealed Ive and Sam Altman chose "io" in mid-2023. Before the lawsuit, iyO CEO Jason Rugolo approached Altman in early 2025 for funding for a "human-computer interface" project, but Altman declined, citing a competitive endeavor.

OpenAI countered that its first "io" product would not be a wearable device, and that Rugolo had voluntarily disclosed details while suggesting an acquisition. Despite this, a district court issued the TRO, which the Ninth Circuit affirmed. The appeals court agreed there was a likelihood of confusion between "IO" and "iyO," a significant risk of "reverse confusion" given OpenAI's size, and potential irreparable harm to iyO's brand.

The ruling, however, only bars the marketing and selling of hardware sufficiently similar to iyO's planned AI-audio computer, not all uses of the "io" name. The case now returns to the district court for a preliminary injunction hearing in April 2026, with the broader litigation expected to extend into 2027 and 2028. OpenAI's first hardware device is expected to launch next year.
chinese_title: 乔纳森·伊夫的OpenAI设备不得使用“io”名称
chinese_summary:
美国一家上诉法院维持了一项临时限制令，阻止OpenAI和乔尼·艾维（Jony Ive）的新硬件合资企业使用“io”这个名称，用于与AI音频初创公司iyO计划的产品类似的产品。

iyO于今年早些时候提起诉讼，称OpenAI计划使用的“io”品牌与其自身名称过于接近，用于类似的AI驱动硬件。法院文件显示，艾维和萨姆·奥特曼（Sam Altman）在2023年中期选择了“io”这个名称。在诉讼之前，iyO首席执行官杰森·鲁戈洛（Jason Rugolo）于2025年初接触奥特曼，寻求为一个“人机界面”项目提供资金，但奥特曼以存在竞争性项目为由拒绝。

OpenAI反驳称，其首款“io”产品并非可穿戴设备，且鲁戈洛是在提出收购建议时自愿披露了相关细节。尽管如此，一家地方法院发布了临时限制令，第九巡回上诉法院对此予以维持。上诉法院同意，“IO”和“iyO”之间存在混淆的可能性，考虑到OpenAI的规模，存在“反向混淆”的重大风险，以及对iyO品牌造成潜在的不可弥补的损害。

然而，该裁决仅禁止营销和销售与iyO计划的AI音频计算机足够相似的硬件，而非禁止所有“io”名称的使用。此案现已发回地方法院，定于2026年4月举行初步禁令听证会，而更广泛的诉讼预计将持续到2027年和2028年。OpenAI的首款硬件设备预计将于明年推出。

title: Detainees at 'Alligator Alcatraz' facing 'harrowing human right violations'
summary:
A new Amnesty International report alleges "harrowing human rights violations" at Florida's state-run "Alligator Alcatraz" and the privately operated Krome immigration processing center. The report, based on detainee interviews and a site visit, details "cruel, inhuman and degrading treatment," in some cases amounting to torture.

At "Alligator Alcatraz," detainees were allegedly shackled inside a 2ft high metal cage ("the box") and left outside without water for up to a day as punishment. The facility is also cited for unsanitary conditions, overflowing toilets, limited showers, constant lighting, poor food, and denied or inconsistent medical care. Detainees were reportedly always shackled outside their cells. Despite a federal judge's closure order, the facility reopened, operating outside federal oversight, making detainee tracking difficult and potentially leading to "enforced disappearances." Florida Governor Ron DeSantis's press secretary dismissed the report as "politically motivated fabrications."

Amnesty found similar issues at Krome, including overcrowding, medical neglect, "alarming" disciplinary practices like prolonged solitary confinement, and challenges accessing legal representation. Violence and racist abuse by guards were common, with some detainees forced to sleep for days on buses without facilities. Human Rights Watch previously reported abuses at Krome.

Amnesty International recommends closing "Alligator Alcatraz," ending Florida's cooperation with federal immigration authorities, and halting the "criminalization of migration" and mass detention, calling the situation a "human rights crisis."
chinese_title: “鳄鱼恶魔岛”囚犯遭受“骇人听闻的人权侵犯”
chinese_summary:
一份新的大赦国际报告指控，佛罗里达州政府运营的“鳄鱼恶魔岛”和私营的克罗姆移民处理中心存在“骇人听闻的侵犯人权行为”。这份报告基于对被拘留者的采访和实地考察，详细描述了“残忍、不人道和有辱人格的待遇”，在某些情况下等同于酷刑。

在“鳄鱼恶魔岛”，被拘留者据称作为惩罚，被镣铐束缚在一个两英尺高的金属笼子（“箱子”）里，并在没有水的情况下被留在户外长达一天。该设施还被指存在不卫生的条件、马桶溢水、淋浴受限、持续照明、伙食差以及医疗服务被拒绝或不稳定等问题。据报道，被拘留者在牢房外总是被镣铐束缚。尽管联邦法官下达了关闭令，该设施仍重新开放，并在联邦监管之外运营，这使得被拘留者的追踪变得困难，并可能导致“强迫失踪”。佛罗里达州州长罗恩·德桑蒂斯的媒体秘书斥责该报告是“出于政治动机的捏造”。

大赦国际在克罗姆也发现了类似问题，包括过度拥挤、医疗疏忽、“令人担忧”的纪律措施（例如长时间单独监禁）以及难以获得法律代表。警卫的暴力和种族主义虐待很普遍，有些被拘留者被迫在没有设施的巴士上睡了好几天。人权观察此前也曾报道过克罗姆的虐待行为。

大赦国际建议关闭“鳄鱼恶魔岛”，结束佛罗里达州与联邦移民当局的合作，并停止“将移民定罪”和大规模拘留，称这种情况为“人权危机”。

title: I cracked a $200 software protection with xcopy
summary:
The author investigated Enigma Protector, a $200 commercial software protection system, applied to the "Bass Bully Premium" VST3 synthesizer. Enigma promises robust security with features like RSA cryptographic signatures, hardware-bound licensing, anti-debugging, and VM-based code obfuscation, suggesting a formidable challenge.

Initial analysis confirmed the installer was heavily protected by Enigma, exhibiting obfuscated entry points and requiring complex key validation involving RSA signatures and hardware ID binding. The author was preparing for intricate tasks like RSA key factorization or runtime hooking to bypass these measures.

However, a critical flaw was discovered: the actual VST3 plugin (the "payload") extracted by the protected installer was completely unprotected. Scans of the VST's DLL revealed no references to Enigma Protector or its licensing APIs. The VST simply ran without any license checks or runtime protection whatsoever.

Consequently, the sophisticated $200 protection system was defeated by an "embarrassingly simple" method: copying the installed files. The "crack" involved merely using `xcopy` to duplicate the VST and its associated data from the installation directory, allowing the software to function on any machine without a legitimate license or further modification.

This case study underscores the importance of threat modeling and correct implementation over fancy security features. Despite its advanced capabilities, Enigma Protector was rendered useless because it only protected the installer, leaving the actual product's runtime completely exposed. The incident demonstrates that expensive protection systems are worthless if applied incorrectly, and sometimes the simplest attack is the most effective.
chinese_title: 我用xcopy破解了两百美元的软件保护
chinese_summary:
作者对应用于“Bass Bully Premium”VST3合成器的Enigma Protector（一款售价200美元的商业软件保护系统）进行了调查。Enigma宣称提供强大的安全性，具有RSA加密签名、硬件绑定许可、反调试以及基于虚拟机的代码混淆等功能，这预示着一项艰巨的挑战。

初步分析证实，安装程序受到Enigma的严密保护，表现出混淆的入口点，并需要涉及RSA签名和硬件ID绑定的复杂密钥验证。作者当时正准备进行RSA密钥分解或运行时钩取等复杂操作来绕过这些保护措施。

然而，一个关键缺陷被发现：由受保护安装程序提取的实际VST3插件（即“有效载荷”）完全没有受到保护。对VST的DLL文件进行扫描后发现，其中没有Enigma Protector或其许可API的任何引用。该VST在没有任何许可检查或运行时保护的情况下直接运行。

因此，这个复杂的200美元保护系统被一个“极其简单”的方法击败了：复制安装文件。所谓的“破解”仅仅是使用`xcopy`将VST及其相关数据从安装目录复制出来，从而使该软件无需合法许可或进一步修改即可在任何机器上运行。

这个案例研究强调了威胁建模和正确实施的重要性，而非花哨的安全功能。尽管Enigma Protector功能先进，但由于它只保护了安装程序，却让实际产品的运行时完全暴露无遗，因而变得毫无用处。这一事件表明，昂贵的保护系统如果应用不当则毫无价值，有时最简单的攻击却是最有效的。

title: Countdown until the AI bubble bursts
summary:
This satirical project, titled "Countdown until the AI bubble bursts," presents a fictional timer counting down days, hours, minutes, and seconds to a "Predicted Date." The site explicitly states it's not real, but rather a thought experiment where an AI (Gemini) predicts its own potential industry decline based on web news.

Every night, a script prompts Gemini to search the web for both positive and negative AI news. Based on the sentiment and economic indicators found, the AI updates the predicted "burst date" and provides an explanation for its reasoning. Users can also view past predictions to see how sentiment has evolved.

The creators clarify they are not against AI, acknowledging its utility. However, they are critical of the current massive hype cycle, the "AI in everything" trend, and the circular investment economy prevalent in the sector. The project itself was created with AI, and users are encouraged to replicate the analysis using any AI model with web search capabilities.
chinese_title: AI泡沫破裂倒计时
chinese_summary:
这个名为“AI泡沫破裂倒计时”的讽刺项目，展示了一个虚构的计时器，倒计时显示天、小时、分钟和秒，直至一个“预测日期”。该网站明确指出它并非真实存在，而是一个思想实验，其中一个AI（Gemini）根据网络新闻预测自身潜在的行业衰退。

每晚，一个脚本会提示Gemini搜索网络上的正面和负面AI新闻。根据所发现的情绪和经济指标，该AI会更新预测的“破裂日期”，并提供其推理的解释。用户还可以查看过去的预测，以了解情绪是如何演变的。

创作者澄清他们并非反对AI，承认其效用。然而，他们批评当前大规模的炒作周期、“万物皆AI”的趋势以及该领域普遍存在的循环投资经济。该项目本身就是用AI创建的，并且鼓励用户使用任何具有网络搜索能力的AI模型来复制该分析。

title: EU hits X with €120M fine for breaching the Digital Services Act
summary:
The European Union has fined Elon Musk's social media platform X €120 million for breaching transparency rules under its Digital Services Act (DSA). European Commission Vice President Henna Virkkunen stated the fine was imposed for "deceiving users with blue checkmarks, obscuring information on ads and shutting out researchers," clarifying that it was about enforcing EU rules, not censorship.

This marks the first penalty of its kind from the European Commission, which initiated investigations in December 2023. X was penalized for using blue checkmarks on paid accounts to falsely imply authenticity, lacking transparency regarding the advertisers, and denying data access to researchers. The €120 million fine is allocated as €45 million for checkmarks, €35 million for advertising transparency, and €40 million for researcher data access. While DSA fines can reach 6% of global revenue, the Commission stressed the focus was on enforcement, not the highest possible fine. Further investigations into X regarding illegal and manipulated content are ongoing.

The US government has strongly condemned the EU's action. US Vice President JD Vance criticized the EU for "attacking American companies over garbage" instead of supporting free speech. US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick threatened trade consequences. Brendan Carr, chairman of the FCC, accused the EU of "regulatory suffocation" and "taxing Americans to subsidize a continent held back by Europe’s own suffocating regulations."
chinese_title: 欧盟对X处以1.2亿欧元罚款，因违反《数字服务法案》
chinese_summary:
欧盟已对埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台X处以1.2亿欧元的罚款，原因是其违反了《数字服务法案》（DSA）规定的透明度规则。欧盟委员会副主席亨娜·维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）表示，此次罚款是因为X“用蓝色认证标记欺骗用户、模糊广告信息并阻止研究人员”，她澄清说这是为了执行欧盟规则，而非审查制度。

这是欧盟委员会自2023年12月启动调查以来，首次开出此类罚单。X公司因在付费账户上使用蓝色认证标记虚假暗示真实性、广告商信息缺乏透明度以及拒绝研究人员获取数据而被罚。这1.2亿欧元的罚款中，4500万欧元涉及认证标记，3500万欧元涉及广告透明度，4000万欧元涉及研究人员数据访问。尽管《数字服务法案》的罚款最高可达全球营收的6%，但欧盟委员会强调，重点在于执行，而非开出最高额罚款。对X公司非法和操纵内容的进一步调查仍在进行中。

美国政府强烈谴责了欧盟的这一举动。美国副总统J.D.万斯（J.D. Vance）批评欧盟“为了垃圾而攻击美国公司”，而不是支持言论自由。美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）威胁将采取贸易后果。美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）主席布伦丹·卡尔（Brendan Carr）指责欧盟“监管窒息”，并“向美国人征税以补贴一个被欧洲自身窒息性法规所阻碍的大陆”。

title: Linus Torvalds thinks Elon Musk is 'too stupid' to be working at a tech company
summary:
Linus Torvalds, the creator of Linux, believes Elon Musk is "too stupid" to be working at a tech company, specifically criticizing his management of Twitter (now X). In an interview with Linux Journal, Torvalds expressed his disappointment with Musk's decisions and leadership, describing them as "obviously bad ideas" from an engineering perspective.

Torvalds highlighted Musk's apparent lack of understanding regarding the technical intricacies and the human element involved in running a large tech platform. He particularly noted Musk's erratic behavior and the dismissive attitude towards the engineers and staff at Twitter, suggesting that Musk fundamentally misunderstands what makes a successful tech company tick. Torvalds implied that Musk's approach, characterized by a lack of respect for expertise and a penchant for impulsive, technically unsound decisions, demonstrates a profound incompetence for the tech sector. He contrasted Musk's actions with what he considers effective, respectful leadership in technology.
chinese_title: 莱纳斯·托瓦兹认为埃隆·马斯克“太蠢了”，不配在科技公司工作。
chinese_summary:
Linux 创始人林纳斯·托瓦兹认为埃隆·马斯克“蠢到不适合在科技公司工作”，尤其批评了他对 Twitter（现称 X）的管理。在接受《Linux Journal》采访时，托瓦兹对马斯克的决策和领导力表示失望，从工程角度形容这些是“显而易见的糟糕想法”。

托瓦兹强调，马斯克显然缺乏对运营大型科技平台所涉及的技术复杂性以及人文因素的理解。他特别指出马斯克反复无常的行为以及对 Twitter 工程师和员工的轻蔑态度，暗示马斯克从根本上误解了成功科技公司的运作之道。托瓦兹暗示，马斯克的做法——其特点是缺乏对专业知识的尊重，以及热衷于冲动、技术上不合理的决策——表明他在科技领域有着深刻的无能。他将马斯克的行为与他认为在科技领域中有效且尊重的领导力形成了对比。

title: Rats Snatching Bats Out of the Air and Eating Them–Researchers Got It on Video
summary:
New research, published in *Global Ecology and Conservation* by Gloza-Rausch et al., details the first scientific observations of brown rats (Rattus norvegicus) actively hunting and eating bats in northern Germany. Scientists used infrared cameras at two urban bat hibernation sites, capturing footage of rats employing distinct strategies: ambushing stationary bats and, remarkably, snatching flying bats mid-air by standing on their hind legs.

This novel behavior underscores the rats' significant adaptability in exploiting urban food resources. However, it also presents a dual concern. Firstly, invasive rat populations could severely impact local bat populations; calculations suggest that rats could consume up to 7% of bats at one major hibernation site during winter. Secondly, the close interactions between species known to carry a variety of pathogens raise concerns about disease spillover, potentially altering disease dynamics and expanding transmission opportunities to humans and domestic animals.

Researchers advocate for controlling invasive brown rat populations at key bat hibernation sites through improved garbage management and sewer maintenance. This approach is seen as a "win-win" solution, simultaneously protecting vulnerable bat populations and mitigating potential public health risks.
chinese_title: 老鼠空中捕食蝙蝠——研究人员拍下视频
chinese_summary:
Gloza-Rausch 等人在《全球生态与保护》期刊上发表的一项新研究，详细记录了首次科学观察到褐鼠（Rattus norvegicus）在德国北部积极捕食并食用蝙蝠的行为。科学家们在两个城市蝙蝠冬眠地使用红外摄像机，捕捉到老鼠采用不同策略的画面：伏击静止的蝙蝠，以及令人惊讶地通过后腿站立在空中捕捉飞行的蝙蝠。

这种新颖的行为凸显了老鼠在利用城市食物资源方面显著的适应性。然而，它也带来了双重担忧。首先，入侵性的鼠群可能严重影响当地蝙蝠种群；据计算，在冬季，老鼠在一个主要冬眠地可能捕食多达7%的蝙蝠。其次，已知携带多种病原体的物种之间的密切互动引发了对疾病溢出的担忧，这可能改变疾病动态，并扩大向人类和家畜传播的机会。

研究人员提倡通过改善垃圾管理和下水道维护，在关键蝙蝠冬眠地控制入侵性褐鼠种群。这种方法被视为一个“双赢”的解决方案，既能保护脆弱的蝙蝠种群，又能减轻潜在的公共卫生风险。

title: Wall Street races to protect itself from AI bubble
summary: The provided article, despite its title suggesting a broader discussion on Wall Street's efforts to protect itself from an AI bubble, focuses solely on a specific event: Netflix's stock tumbled even after the company reported record-breaking earnings. The content does not elaborate on the AI bubble, Wall Street's reactions, or any connection between Netflix's performance and the broader market concerns indicated by the title.
chinese_title: 华尔街竞相防范AI泡沫
chinese_summary: 这篇文章尽管标题暗示将更广泛地讨论华尔街如何保护自身免受人工智能泡沫的影响，但其内容却只专注于一个具体事件：Netflix公司在公布创纪录的盈利后股价仍暴跌。文章并未详细阐述人工智能泡沫、华尔街的反应，也未说明Netflix的表现与标题所指的更广泛市场担忧之间有何关联。

title: Extra Instructions Of The 65XX Series CPU (1996)
summary:
This 1996 document by Adam Vardy, "Extra Instructions Of The 65XX Series CPU," details the 105 "undocumented," "unofficial," or "future expansion" opcodes of the 6502/85XX series CPUs, which are not part of the standard 151 instruction set. Compiled with help from "The Complete Inner Space Anthology" and Vardy's own research, it provides hexadecimal opcode values, addressing modes, execution cycles, and equivalent standard instructions.

The described opcodes often combine two standard operations:
*   **ASO (SLO):** ASL memory then ORA accumulator.
*   **RLA:** ROL memory then AND accumulator.
*   **LSE (SRE):** LSR memory then EOR accumulator.
*   **RRA:** ROR memory then ADC accumulator.
*   **DCM (DCP):** DEC memory then CMP accumulator.
*   **INS (ISC):** INC memory then SBC accumulator.

Other opcodes include:
*   **LAX:** Loads A and X from memory.
*   **AXS (SAX):** ANDs A and X, stores to memory.
*   Immediate mode operations like **ALR** (AND A, then LSR) and **ARR** (AND A, then ROR, with complex flag behavior).
*   **XAA** (TXA, then AND immediate) and **OAL** (OR A with a constant, AND immediate, store to A and X), both noted for varying behavior across machines.
*   **NOP** (1A, 3A, etc.), **SKB** (skip byte), **SKW** (skip word), and **HLT** (crash CPU, 02, 12, etc.).

Vardy's exclusive discoveries, **TAS, SAY, XAS, and AXA**, involve complex AND operations with registers and memory. These are characterized by not affecting standard flags/registers and exhibiting erratic behavior (e.g., storing to unintended addresses, video display dependency). The document also corrects misinformation, stating that opcodes like MKA/MKX do not exist, and clarifies addressing modes for several instructions. It warns about variability and unreliability for some opcodes (LAS, XAA, OAL).
chinese_title: 65XX 系列 CPU 的扩展指令 (1996)
chinese_summary:
亚当·瓦迪在1996年的这份题为《65XX系列CPU的额外指令》的文档中，详细介绍了6502/85XX系列CPU的105个“未文档化”、“非官方”或“未来扩展”操作码，这些操作码不属于标准的151条指令集。该文档在《The Complete Inner Space Anthology》和瓦迪自身研究的帮助下汇编而成，提供了十六进制操作码值、寻址模式、执行周期以及等效的标准指令。

所描述的操作码通常结合了两种标准操作：
*   **ASO (SLO):** ASL内存，然后ORA累加器。
*   **RLA:** ROL内存，然后AND累加器。
*   **LSE (SRE):** LSR内存，然后EOR累加器。
*   **RRA:** ROR内存，然后ADC累加器。
*   **DCM (DCP):** DEC内存，然后CMP累加器。
*   **INS (ISC):** INC内存，然后SBC累加器。

其他操作码包括：
*   **LAX:** 从内存加载A和X。
*   **AXS (SAX):** 对A和X执行AND操作，然后存储到内存。
*   立即模式操作，例如**ALR**（AND A，然后LSR）和**ARR**（AND A，然后ROR，具有复杂的标志行为）。
*   **XAA**（TXA，然后立即数AND）和**OAL**（将A与常量进行OR操作，然后立即数AND，存储到A和X），两者均因在不同机器上行为各异而著称。
*   **NOP**（1A，3A等）、**SKB**（跳过字节）、**SKW**（跳过字）和**HLT**（使CPU崩溃，02，12等）。

瓦迪独家发现的**TAS、SAY、XAS和AXA**涉及与寄存器和内存的复杂AND操作。它们的特点是不影响标准标志/寄存器，并表现出不稳定的行为（例如，存储到非预期地址，依赖于视频显示）。该文档还纠正了错误信息，声明MKA/MKX等操作码不存在，并阐明了几条指令的寻址模式。它警告了某些操作码（LAS、XAA、OAL）的可变性和不可靠性。

title: Rsync.net Technical Notes – Q4 2025
summary:
Rsync.net's Q4 2025 Technical Notes detail three key areas: secure append-only backups, ZFS vdev rebalancing, and Borg mount syntax.

For append-only backups, rsync.net now supports `rclone serve restic --stdio`. This method operates over standard I/O, bypassing typical network socket restrictions for `rclone serve`. Users create two SSH keys: a "normal" key for initial `restic init` setup, and a restricted "append-only" key. The restricted key, configured in `authorized_keys`, is explicitly limited to `rclone serve restic --stdio --append-only` for a specific repository. This ensures that a compromised client system cannot delete or modify remote backups, as it only possesses the append-only key. Restic itself functions via `rclone` on the rsync.net platform.

The document also addresses ZFS vdev rebalancing. When a new vdev is added to a near-full zpool, new writes initially distribute but eventually concentrate on the newest vdev as older ones become nearly full, degrading performance. The solution involves setting `vfs.zfs.mg.noalloc_threshold` (e.g., to 8% free space) and copying a large dataset (e.g., 10-12.5TB) from the pool back onto itself. This process redistributes the copied data evenly across all vdevs. Deleting the original data then effectively rebalances and defragments the pool, improving overall performance.

Lastly, the notes demonstrate remotely mounting a Borg repository. The command `borg mount --remote-path=borg14 user@rsync.net:path/path/repo/ /mnt/borg` mounts the remote repository locally as a read-only `borgfs` (FUSE) filesystem, facilitating easy access and inspection of backups.
chinese_title: Rsync.net 技术笔记 — 2025年第四季度
chinese_summary:
Rsync.net 2025年第四季度技术说明详细介绍了三个关键领域：安全的仅追加备份、ZFS vdev重平衡以及Borg挂载语法。

针对仅追加备份，rsync.net现已支持 `rclone serve restic --stdio`。此方法通过标准I/O运行，绕过了 `rclone serve` 常见的网络套接字限制。用户需创建两个SSH密钥：一个用于初始 `restic init` 设置的“普通”密钥，以及一个受限的“仅追加”密钥。在 `authorized_keys` 中配置的受限密钥，明确限制仅可用于特定存储库的 `rclone serve restic --stdio --append-only`。这确保了即使客户端系统被攻破，也无法删除或修改远程备份，因为它只拥有仅追加密钥。Restic本身在rsync.net平台上通过 `rclone` 运行。

文档还阐述了ZFS vdev重平衡问题。当向一个接近满载的zpool添加新的vdev时，新的写入最初会分散分布，但随着旧的vdev几乎填满，写入最终会集中在新vdev上，从而降低性能。解决方案是设置 `vfs.zfs.mg.noalloc_threshold`（例如，设置为8%的可用空间），并将一个大型数据集（例如10-12.5TB）从池中复制回池本身。这个过程会将复制的数据均匀地重新分布到所有vdev上。随后删除原始数据，即可有效重平衡并整理池，从而提升整体性能。

最后，说明还演示了远程挂载Borg存储库。命令 `borg mount --remote-path=borg14 user@rsync.net:path/path/repo/ /mnt/borg` 将远程存储库本地挂载为只读的 `borgfs` (FUSE) 文件系统，方便轻松访问和检查备份。

title: Zellij: A terminal workspace with batteries included
summary: Zellij is a "terminal workspace with batteries included." The article highlights its availability for Linux and macOS, offering direct download links. For users who wish to try Zellij without a full installation, it provides simple commands for bash/zsh and fish shells, along with a link to view the execution script. Additionally, the developers offer Zellij stickers.
chinese_title: Zellij：一个开箱即用的终端工作区
chinese_summary: Zellij 是一个“自带所需功能的终端工作区”。文章强调它适用于 Linux 和 macOS，并提供直接下载链接。对于希望在不完全安装的情况下试用 Zellij 的用户，它提供了适用于 bash/zsh 和 fish shell 的简单命令，以及一个查看执行脚本的链接。此外，开发者还提供 Zellij 贴纸。
